SVGAttributeKerning.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The kerning attribute indicates whether the spacing between glyph should be adjusted based on kerning tables that are included in the relevant font (i.e., enable auto-kerning) or instead disable auto-kerning and set the spacing between them to a specific length (typically, zero).

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute kerning can be used as a CSS property. In CSS the property is called font-kerning, though.
